# Course Content

This course provides an introduction to spatial analysis in R and the foundational concepts of spatial statistics. It covers the creation of 2D and 3D data visualizations and mapping using `ggplot2` and `plotly` in R. The curriculum includes point pattern and area data analysis, with a focus on complete spatial randomness, spatial autocorrelation, hotspot analysis, and spatial interpolation methods for spatially continuous data. The course emphasizes the use of the R programming language for geocomputation and the generation of dynamic documents using R Markdown.
